Articles.Content:
Hello!

I'm not sure if this is in the right forum section or not but it's the closest to what I can find. I have bought KSP on Steam and it's currently version 1.0.4.

The problem for me is that none of my favourite mods (KSPI, Lazor, B9, KW) are updated beyond .90. None of them work.

So my question is how do I get an earlier version of KSP? I've looked everywhere on steam and there is no option for reverting versions. Is there any way to legally (Or would it even be illegal for me since I have a legitimate purchase of the game?) obtain an earlier version of KSP?

Edited October 21, 2015 by Thovian
The previous version is listed as a "Beta" in Steam, find that section of the game properties. Now I'm not sure what version is currently considered previous.

The previous version is listed as a "Beta" in Steam, find that section of the game properties. Now I'm not sure what version is currently considered previous.

Perfect! Thank you so much.
